txt.en: 'Excellent work! Glad to see you were not stomped to bits and gored by that monster's rack. I have one more challenge for you, if you are prepared.'
Dale-lands Moose and Oakthorn can be found in the wilderness near Dale.\n\nYou should hunt Dale-lands Moose and Oakthorn.
Rékar the Huntsman can be found in Dale.\n\nYou should talk to Rékar.

'Many people underestimate the Moose. It is a large plant-eater lacking intelligence. Do not be fooled. An angry bull moose is a threat to any grown man or woman. One especially large moose, Oakthorn, has been known to even charge at caravans as they travel along the roads! See if you can hunt him down.'
Rékar the Huntsman has challenged you to bring down some well-known beasts in the Dale-lands.
